title: Get valid JSON documents
sql:
with are_these_json ( test_and_see_if_it ) as (
  select '{ "an" : "object" }' from dual union all
  select '[ "an", "array" ]'   from dual union all
  select '"json scalar"'       from dual union all
  select 'not json'            from dual
)
  select * from are_these_json
  where  test_and_see_if_it is json;
  
TEST_AND_SEE_IF_IT 
-------------------
{ "an" : "object" }
[ "an", "array" ]
"json scalar"
